---
title: 'Migration'
description: 'How to migrate documentation from your existing provider'
icon: 'arrow-up-from-bracket'
---

Use our [public packages](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@mintlify/scraping) to migrate docs from supported providers:

</CardGroup>

Don't see your provider? Contact sales@mintlify.com for assistance.

## Quick Start

Install the package:

```bash
npm i @mintlify/scraping
```

Usage:
<CodeGroup>
```bash Section
mintlify-scrape section [url]    # Scrapes multiple pages
```

```bash Page
mintlify-scrape page [url]       # Scrapes a single page
```
</CodeGroup>

For OpenAPI:
```bash
mintlify-scrape openapi-file [filename]

Options:
-w, --writeFiles  Write frontmatter files [boolean] [default: true]
-o, --outDir      Output directory [string]
```
